name: Popmundo Retro Style
description: If you miss ye ol'Retro Popmundo style, here's something for P2.
additional_info: Created only for Popmundo 2.0 • Version 1.0.5 (July 25th 2012): Popmundo.aspx/Locale/Employees/XXX fix for CEO/Company presidents. • Version 1.0.4: Popmundo.aspx/ChooseCharacter fix (character names were still colored in white) • Version 1.0.3: domains fix • Version 1.0.2: changing the "Popmundo" header into the old "Popomundo" • Version 1.0.1: domains fix • Version 1.0: first release
